https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eX21RlJvTzGUADLdkL6IJErwi5j.jpg A selection of Dusty Springfield's performances at the BBC from 1961 to 1995. Dusty was one of Britain's great pop divas, guaranteed to give us a big melody in songs soaring with drama and yearning. Dusty Springfield at the BBC
